title: Grands! Mini Pizzas
directions: Press each biscuit into 6-inch round. Place on 2 large or 3 small greased cookie sheets. Top each round with pizza sauce, cheese and pepperoni.
Bake at 375 degrees F 10 to 15 minutes or until bottoms are deep golden brown and cheese is bubbly.
ingredients: 1 (16.3 ounce) can Pillsbury Grands! refrigerated biscuits
